full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES SMON LAM GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I ZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BTAGS NAS, MI MTHUN CIG BYAS PA YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYID PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GAS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GIS RIM GROR DGOS PA CHE BA BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR RANG RANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYA BA'I SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BRGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
